extDescription.message: Smart bookmark management tool with AI tag recommendations

settings_language_hint.message: Page will refresh after changing language

popup_save_bookmark_desc.message: Generate AI tags for the current page and save to bookmark library

popup_save_to_newtab_desc.message: Save current page to browser bookmarks (NewTab bi-directional sync)

popup_collect_tabs_desc.message: One-click collect all tabs in current window, free up memory

popup_tip_bookmark.message: Save Bookmark: Best for important pages, supports AI smart tags

popup_tip_newtab.message: Save to NewTab: Quick save to browser bookmarks, bi-directional sync with NewTab

popup_tip_collect.message: Collect Tabs: Best for temporarily saving many tabs, similar to OneTab

bookmark_exists_desc.message: This URL has already been saved. You can choose from the following actions

action_create_snapshot_desc.message: Save a snapshot of the current page for this bookmark

action_add_tags_desc.message: Add new tags to the existing bookmark

collection_create_group_desc.message: Save selected tabs as a new group

collection_add_to_existing_desc.message: Add tabs to an existing group

collection_add_to_folder_desc.message: Create new group under a folder

placeholder_group_name.message: Leave empty to auto-generate timestamp name

options_description.message: Manage AI integration, sync strategies, and server configuration for a smooth knowledge collection experience.

popup_ai_analyzing.message: AI is analyzing the current page, please wait...

popup_ai_disabled_desc.message: Please select tags from the library below, or enable AI recommendations in settings.

popup_welcome_desc.message: Complete basic configuration to generate smart tags and category suggestions for any webpage.

popup_required_info_desc.message: Prepare the following three configurations, and the assistant can start working immediately:

error_select_tag.message: Please select at least one tag

placeholder_custom_title.message: Enter custom title and press Enter or click Apply

placeholder_custom_desc.message: Enter custom description and press Ctrl+Enter or click Apply

tab_collection_select_at_least_one.message: Please select at least one tab

tab_collection_collected_count.message: Successfully collected $count$ tabs. Close these tabs?

tag_library_desc.message: Synced with your historical tag data, click to add.

ai_recommend_desc.message: Generated in real-time based on page content, click to select.

placeholder_add_tag.message: Enter tag name and press Enter to add

error_folders_not_loaded.message: Folder list not loaded, AI folder recommendation unavailable. You can still save to root directory.

msg_tabs_added_to_group.message: Successfully added $count$ tabs to existing group

msg_tabs_offline_saved.message: Network unavailable, saved $count$ tabs offline, will sync when network recovers

confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.

error_api_key_required.message: Please fill in API Key before saving

error_config_not_loaded.message: Config not loaded, please try again later

error_provider_unknown.message: Cannot determine AI provider for this config

error_no_tabs_to_collect.message: No tabs to collect in current window

error_provider_not_supported.message: Current AI service does not support automatic model list fetching

onboarding_ai_key_desc.message: Model credentials for generating smart tags, supports multiple providers.

onboarding_site_url_desc.message: Points to your bookmark service endpoint, defaults to TMarks official address.

onboarding_site_key_desc.message: For syncing and saving bookmark data, generate key in service console.

onboarding_tip_1.message: Save multiple API and model combinations in settings, switch scenarios with one click.

onboarding_tip_2.message: Support custom Prompt to meet different tag styles or language needs.

onboarding_tip_3.message: After configuration, the assistant will automatically capture the current tab and generate recommendations.

newtab_save_desc.message: Select a folder to save, or use AI recommendation.

options_tmarks_tag_desc.message: Configure TMarks tag recommendation (generate tags when saving bookmarks).

options_enable_ai_tag_desc.message: When enabled, AI will analyze pages and recommend tags when saving bookmarks.

options_save_config_desc.message: Enter a memorable name for current AI settings.

options_sync_desc.message: Configure sync server (TMarks) to sync bookmarks and tag data.

options_tmarks_info_1.message: TMarks is a tag-based bookmark navigator

options_tmarks_info_2.message: Supports multi-device sync, tag management, full-text search

options_tmarks_info_3.message: Just enter base URL, system will auto-complete /api path

options_api_key_hint.message: Generate API Key in TMarks settings

options_cache_desc.message: View local cache overview and manually trigger sync.

options_newtab_folder_desc.message: Configure AI folder recommendation for Popup "Save to NewTab".

options_newtab_root_hint.message: NewTab root is fixed to bookmark bar folder: TMarks.

options_newtab_ai_organize_hint.message: "AI Organize" will create backup and generate organized bookmark structure within this root.

options_enable_newtab_ai_desc.message: When enabled, AI can recommend folders when saving to NewTab.

options_recommend_count_hint.message: Number of AI recommended candidate folders (1-20)

options_chrome_runtime_error.message: chrome.runtime not supported in current environment

options_no_saved_configs.message: No saved configs yet. Fill in API info and click "Save Current Config" to create a preset.

options_models_loaded.message: Loaded $count$ models, select or enter manually.

options_model_fetch_hint.message: Enter API URL and Key, then refresh to get available models.

options_ai_config_desc.message: Connect your smart tag service, manage models and call strategies.

error_network.message: Network connection failed, please check network settings

error_sync.message: Sync failed, please try again later

error_ai_recommend_fallback.message: AI recommendation failed, using local tags. You can retry.

error_ai_recommend_fallback_with_msg.message: AI recommendation failed: $msg$. Using local tags, you can retry.

error_auth_failed.message: Authentication failed: API Key is invalid or expired, please check your TMarks API Key in settings

error_permission_denied.message: Permission denied: Your API Key does not have permission to save collections

error_rate_limit.message: Too many requests, please try again later

error_ai_rate_limit.message: AI service is congested/rate limited (429). Please try again later, or switch to another model/provider.

error_server_error.message: TMarks server error, please try again later

error_select_one_tag.message: Please select at least one tag

msg_offline_saved.message: Network unavailable, saved locally, will sync when network recovers

error_custom_ai_url_required.message: Custom AI requires API URL configuration

error_network_error.message: Network error: Cannot connect to TMarks server, please check your network connection

error_permission_save_bookmark.message: Permission denied: Your API Key does not have permission to save bookmarks

msg_bookmark_exists_snapshot.message: Bookmark already exists, created new snapshot for it

pref_defaults_desc.message: Configure default options when saving bookmarks.

pref_thumbnail_hint.message: Whether to include page thumbnail when saving.

pref_snapshot_hint.message: Whether to create webpage snapshot when saving.

sidebar_delete_group_with_content.message: All content in this group will be deleted. Are you sure?

sidebar_delete_group_move_home.message: Shortcuts in this group will be moved to Home. Are you sure?
sidebar_delete_group_move_home.description: Delete group move to home message

widget_selector_hint.message: Select a widget type to add to current group

dock_drag_sort_hint.message: Drag to sort | Double-click to sync

settings_guide_1.message: 1. In edit mode, double-click a folder to enter it.

settings_guide_2.message: 2. Scroll switch: Use scroll wheel in left/right 30% area to switch groups, middle 40% area to switch pages.

settings_guide_3.message: 3. When there are too many icons in a group, scroll in the icon area to page left/right.

settings_api_key_hint.message: Configure API Key in extension settings to enable sync

settings_auto_refresh_hint.message: Auto update pinned bookmarks cache daily to keep data fresh

settings_custom_rules_placeholder.message:
Example:
Work: github.com, jira., notion.so
Learning: coursera.org, edx.org
Entertainment: bilibili.com, youtube.com
Tools: translate.google.com, regex101.com

settings_custom_rules_hint.message: Rules are given highest priority to AI. Original paths are referenced when tags unavailable.

settings_prompt_json_hint.message: Recommend keeping 'JSON only' constraint to avoid parsing failures.

settings_domain_limit_hint.message: To avoid oversized AI prompts, this limits domains in classification (top N by bookmark count). Organizing still applies to all bookmarks.

settings_batch_hint.message: When domains exceed limit, they're split into batches; AI logs will show 'split into batches, output after all received'.

settings_top_level_hint.message: Recommend 2-7 top-level categories. AI will try to match your setting, merging excess groups.

settings_history_heat_hint_1.message: When enabled, analyzes recent N days of browsing to evaluate domain heat for directory hierarchy.

settings_history_heat_hint_2.message: Top N domains are highlighted in prompt; AI prioritizes them in top-level or homepage (default 20, range 5-100).

settings_strict_hierarchy_hint.message: When enabled, AI can only fine-tune existing hierarchy, no new top-level directories.

settings_allow_new_folders.message: Allow New Folders (disabled in strict mode)

settings_allow_new_folders_hint.message: When disabled, AI can only place domains in existing directories.

settings_prefer_original_paths_hint.message: When enabled, AI tries to keep domains in their historical directories, adjusting only on conflicts.

settings_verbose_logs_hint.message: When disabled, only key steps logged; enabled shows all progress for debugging.

settings_ai_organize_warning.message: Organizing only copies/rebuilds structure within 'TMarks' workspace, won't modify other browser folders. Backup manually if needed.

settings_task_started.message: Task started, waiting for background progress...

settings_organize_complete.message: Complete: processed $processed$ bookmarks$truncated$, created $folders$ folders, copied $bookmarks$ bookmarks

settings_cache_hint.message: Icons are auto-compressed to under 10KB for offline display

settings_cache_failed.message: Failed to cache icons, please retry

batch_delete_confirm_message.message: Are you sure you want to delete $count$ selected shortcuts? This cannot be undone.

batch_tip_auto_delete_desc.message: Folders are auto-deleted when emptied (except Home)

folder_delete_confirm_message.message: Delete folder and all contents? This cannot be undone.
